Hi,

1. I have written a testcase embedded in the main
program. I call junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
in the middle of my program.It goes into the testsuite
executes it properly and then stops.What i need is
that control should return to the next line after i
call  junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite()); What do i
do for that??

2. Can i have 2 testsuite in the same main program.
How does it distinguish that one set of test cases
belong to one suite and another set of testcases
belong to another testsuite.How can i implement this??

Vivek
